name: paper-toggle-button

checked.name: checked
checked.description: Gets or sets the state, `true` is checked and `false` is unchecked.

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.description:
If true, the toggle button is disabled.  A disabled toggle button cannot
be tapped or dragged to change the checked state.

change.name: change
change.description: Fired when the checked state changes due to user interaction.

core-change.name: core-change
core-change.description: Fired when the checked state changes.
